data.title: City of Tampa Honors National Purple Heart Day
data.meta_description: In recognition of Purple Heart Day, Mayor Jane Castor, Tampa Councilman Luis Viera and State Senator Jay Collins will join with the local Military Order of the Purple Heart Chapters and representatives from Florida Gold Star Families to raise a flag above City Hall.
data.text:
In recognition of Purple Heart Day, Mayor Jane Castor, Tampa Councilman Luis Viera and State Senator Jay Collins will join with the local Military Order of the Purple Heart Chapters and representatives from Florida Gold Star Families to raise a flag above City Hall.

This ceremony honors the courage and sacrifice of our military members who have received the Purple Heart.

The Purple Heart is awarded in the name of the President of the United States to any member of the U.S. Armed Forces who was wounded or killed, or who has died after being wounded by enemy action. National Purple Heart Day pays tribute to these brave men and women.
